title: Dinnerbone: 本周可能无快照
author: a20001017
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2014-5-28 18:11 编辑 

Dinnerbone: This week is another short week in Sweden, with Thursday being a public holiday and Wednesday being half day. Chances of snapshot are low.


Dinnerbone: 在瑞典， 本周是另一个超短周，星期四是公众假期，而星期三放半天假。快照几率低。

replies.author: cyqsimon
replies.txt_content: 这周四我可以专心学习了
